About

aboutworksay hello

So here's the thing:

  • A Developer with PASSION
  • An eye for design
  • API nerd
  • Bootstrap & Tailwind Queen👸

I'm a full-stack developer with a passion for clean code, bold design, and building things that actually work—both on screen and in the dirt.🚴‍♀️ With deep experience in WordPress, Vue.js, and the occasional Tailwind bender, I specialize in crafting digital systems that are fast, accessible, and built to last.

“A problem solver who will keep you honest, but isn’t going to ‘value engineer’ a perfectly good design into something unrecognizable.”

I’ve worked across agencies, brands and NGO spaces, building digital products, wrangling APIs, and pushing pixels with a strong eye for user experience.

Code artisan forging WordPress & Vue.js experiences by day, crafting dirt jumps & trails for bikes by night— UX zeal meets mud-and-grit creativity.

Past Experiences

I want to help

Front-End Development

I build performant, responsive, and accessible interfaces using modern frameworks and workflows.

  • Vue.js & Nuxt.js

  • GSAP & Motion Design

Custom WordPress Builds

Modular and maintainable WordPress sites using ACF, Sage, and custom blocks.

  • ACF + Block Development
  • Theme Optimization
  • Bedrock/Trellis Stack

UI/UX Strategy

Collaborative design/dev feedback loops to ensure UI systems support real-world use cases.

  • Design-Dev Bridge
  • Reusable Components
  • Accessibility First

API Integrations

I wire up third-party data in ways that are efficient, flexible, and reliable.

  • Airtable & Headless CMS
  • REST/GraphQL Consumption
  • Dynamic Filtering & Pagination

Creative Tech Problem Solving

Whether the brief is loose, messy, or deeply complex—I break it down and get it working. From branding launches to press strategies, I bring a cross-disciplinary mindset shaped by years of managing communications, PR, and digital systems across mission-driven orgs and creative teams.

  • Systems Thinking
  • Cross-Channel Coordination
  • Project Management
  • Rapid Prototyping
  • Technical & Strategic Advising
